title: The Fastest Woman in This Year’s New York City Marathon Is Israeli
description: “You come to challenge yourself in New York City,” Lonah Chemtai Salpeter said. Her path to representing Israel was a challenge in itself.
dc:creator: Talya Minsberg
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: Lonah Chemtai Salpeter trained this week for the New York City Marathon.
